candidate_text: There's no denying that using digital tools can make managing diabetes easier and more convenient.

That's where Dario Health comes in - an innovative app and device combo that helps users easily track their glucose levels, as well as log food, exercise, and medication.
What sets Dario apart is its user-friendly design and comprehensive features, making it an excellent choice for people with diabetes looking to take control of their health.
Dario Health, founded by Dr. Yossi Grossman, is focused on making diabetes management more accessible and user-friendly.
Their system consists of a smartphone app, which connects to a small glucometer via Bluetooth.
The company has developed a smartphone-enabled blood glucose monitor that automatically tracks and logs readings, providing users with real-time insights into their health.
